page.title: 12THE M25 MOTORWAY.
page.content: The motorway was finally completed and opened in January 1985. FOR:The majority of the people who we questioned agreed with the M25 as they thought it took the traffic away from the area and that it was easier to get around London. AGAINST:The Lea Valley M25 Alliance is the committee against the M25.Many houses have been affected by the motorway from Waltham Cross to Bell Common,and they have been offered double glazing.There were many complaints about the M25,and so people were promised that trees would be planted when the motorway was built,but up to now there have been none.One girl's home is 108 metres from the motorway.There are earth mounds still dumped around her house.People with problems like this are demanding a rate reduction.
